_metadata.description: Radiology template map for structured reporting. Templates composed of reusable components with picklists.

template_structure.header: Merge fields from PACS/EMR (Exam, Demographics, Clinical History, Indication)
template_structure.comparison: Merge field + picklist for prior studies
template_structure.findings: Components with multiple picklists per anatomic region

component_integration.relationship: Components define routes_to arrays for dependency tracking. Edits propagate to all linked templates.

71045.technique_note: AP or PA single view, often portable

74022.technique_note: Supine, upright, +/- chest for free air

ct-head.common_use: Stroke, trauma, headache, altered mental status

ct-chest.common_use: Lung nodule, infection, ILD, cancer staging

ct-chest-ldct.common_use: Lung cancer screening in high-risk patients

ct-calcium-score.common_use: CAD risk stratification, coronary artery assessment

mri-orbits-face-neck.common_use: Orbital mass, neck mass, cranial nerves

mri-abdomen.common_use: Liver lesion, MRCP for biliary, pancreas

mri-pelvis.common_use: Pelvic mass, uterine pathology, rectal cancer staging

76700.technique_note: Liver, GB, pancreas, spleen, kidneys, aorta

76705.technique_note: Single organ or quadrant (e.g., RUQ only)

us-extremity.common_use: Soft tissue mass, joint effusion, foreign body

us-venous-upper-extremity.common_use: Upper extremity DVT, PICC line evaluation

us-arterial-upper-extremity.common_use: Upper extremity arterial disease, thoracic outlet

nm-vq-scan.common_use: PE evaluation, especially in contrast allergy or pregnancy

design_notes: Each template represents a study type that shares findings components
CPT variants under each template differ only in technique (views, contrast)
Templates use nested components: HEADER > TECHNIQUE > FINDINGS (subcomponents) > IMPRESSION
Variant technique differences are noted for billing accuracy
Focused on teleradiology after-hours/overflow: excludes IR, biopsy, mammography, prostate
additions_v3.1: Added: Low-dose CT chest lung cancer screening (71271)
Added: Vascular duplex - Venous LE/UE DVT (93970, 93971)
